### SUPPORT.md
```markdown
# Support for Notfall Engineers On-Demand

Thank you for using **Notfall Engineers On-Demand**! If you need assistance, here's how you can get help:

## Community Support
- **GitHub Discussions**: Join our community to ask questions, share ideas, or get help.
  [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Coulbe/notfall-contributors/discussions)

## Real-Time Collaboration
- **Slack Channel**: Join us on Slack for real-time collaboration and updates.
  [Join Slack](https://notfall.slack.com)

## Reporting Issues
If you encounter a bug or have a feature suggestion, please use the respective issue templates:
- [Bug Report](https://github.com/Coulbe/notfall-contributors/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
- [Feature Request](https://github.com/Coulbe/notfall-contributors/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

Thank you for your support!
